fields.description:
Titanium version: 3.1.1

Issue: On Android 4.1+, Views with height > 699 within the ScrollView are not displayed

h4. Steps to reproduce:
- Set ti.ui.defaultunit property on tiapp.xml to "dip"
- Create a scrollView with the following properties:
layout: "vertical",
contentWidth: "auto",
contentHeight: "auto"
- Add some Views to it.
- Add a tableView (or a regular View) to it and make it grow until its height is higher than 699.

h4. Observed Result:
- The big view disappears from the scrollView

h4. Observations:
- The issue does not reproduce on Android 4.0 and below.
- If we set the property: android:hardwareAccelerated="false" within the <manifest> tag in tiapp.xml, the issue does not reproduce.
fields.summary: ScrollView issue: On Android 4.1+, Views with height > 699 within the ScrollView are not displayed
